california-calling.title: California Calling
california-calling.description: In 2019, an Elephant initiative aimed to support California wildfire victims by selling t-shirts at Elephant's San Francisco Art Week Open House. The website, constructed using Nunjucks, Webpack, and SCSS, successfully raised awareness and boosted donations, which were then contributed to the American Red Cross. It also earned recognition as [Awwards' "Site of the Day."](https://www.awwwards.com/sites/california-calling)

elephant.is.title: Elephant.is
elephant.is.description: The Elephant company website underwent a redesign in 2020, using React, Next.js, and Styled Components. Though it was later revamped in 2022, this initial redesign successfully increased traffic and generated valuable client leads, showcasing the positive impact of this website update.
